data.title: Manhattan Associates and CSF Polska Earn Industry Accolade at Innovation in Logistics Awards Event
data.meta_description: Manhattan Associates and CSF Polska, a Manhattan business partner have won a joint award at Polands third Innovation in Logistics Awards ceremony.
data.text:
Manhattan Associates, the global supply chain optimisation provider, and CSF Polska, a Manhattan business partner and one of Polands leading consultancy services companies, have won a joint award at Polands third Innovation in Logistics Awards ceremony, which took place at the Victoria hotel in Warsaw in December.

The award, presented for Best IT solution, was based on CSF Polskas one4all logistics solution comprising Manhattan Associates ILS: Integrated Logistics Solutions, built on Microsoft NET and CSF Polskas process and project management capabilities.

The Innovation in Logistics Awards event aims to reward those companies that have introduced the most innovative logistics solutions into the European market in the last two years. More than 40 solutions were evaluated as part of this years event, a record number of applications for the competition.

Continual innovation in the way the supply chain is managed and optimised is critical to a companys long-term success and so supply chain practitioners are constantly on the look-out for new technology-enabled logistics solutions, summed up Przemyslaw Walewski, event chairman and chief editor of Eurologistics magazine, an organiser of the Awards event.

Professor Maciej Szymczak, head of the judging panel commented, CSF Polskas one4all offering, of which Manhattan ILS is a key component, is one such solution. The joint offering allows companies to deal with supply chain complexity by giving users the capability to manage and integrate their logistics, communication and workflow activities, and by facilitating project management and ongoing performance monitoring.

Maciej Czernas, vice president at CSF Polska added, The combined CSF Poland and Manhattan team has put a tremendous amount of effort into creating and developing the one4all logistics solution and were optimistic that this award win will serve as a springboard to further success with Manhattan and its solutions in the Polish marketplace.

About CSF Polska

CSF Polska is a leading consultancy services provider specialising in business IT solutions for medium and large-sized enterprises. Founded in 1996, CSF Polska has grown into the organisation it is today by continually enhancing the quality of solutions and services it provides to its clients and by consistently striving to maximise customer satisfaction. CSF Polska offers a broad range of design, implementation and support capabilities for delivering industry-specific, world-class, business IT solutions. For more information, please visit www.csf.pl/en.
